title: Pampered Chef Large Micro Cooker for Microwave 2 Quart
features: Locking lid has two different hole sizes to drain liquids
Designed for right- and left-handed users.
description: Our 2 qt. Micro Cooker is the perfect size for family meals steam veggies, poach chicken, heat soup, and make side dishes in the microwave in minutes. The frosted lid helps you tell when ingredients are melted, and lets you see when liquids begin to boil. The lid has holes that let steam escape and help you drain liquid before serving. Plus, it locks into place so it stays secure as you drain.
